sentences.en: Do you think you're going to land the plane and arrest Hector?
sentences.cn: 你认为在飞机降落后逮捕赫克托?

sentences.en: He had been disturbed by the news of the attack on Hector Coyne.
sentences.cn: 赫克托·科因受袭的消息让他焦虑不安。

sentences.en: Hector returned his scrutiny with deep interest.
sentences.cn: 艾尔多尔,对于他这种审视,也发生深深的兴趣.

sentences.en: Hector was the worst employer I ever had.
sentences.cn: 海克特是我碰到过的最差劲的老板.

sentences.en: Hector: And you to safety, back to your home.
sentences.cn: 赫: 你也到安全的地方, 回家去吧.

sentences.en: Hector: Show yourself , Isaac! I know you are here.
sentences.cn: 赫: 出来!阿萨克! 我知道你在这儿!

sentences.en: Hector: So you can't just focus on the bears themselves.
sentences.cn: 赫克特: 所以你们只是专门照顾黑熊是不可能的了.

sentences.en: Hector: Then why did you keep me from him?
sentences.cn: 赫: 那你为什么让我别追他?

sentences.en: Hector: Wait. I have no reason to fight you.
sentences.cn: 赫: 等等. 我没理由跟你打.

sentences.en: Hector: Wretch! How do you know of these things?
sentences.cn: 赫: 该死的! 你怎么知道这些事情的?

sentences.en: Hi . Are Hector Avila and Maricruz Delgado wedding today?
sentences.cn: 请问今天有举办赫特阿维拉和犸丽戴卡度的婚礼 吗 ?

sentences.en: I suppose you'll hector me until I phone him.
sentences.cn: 我想若是我不给他打电话，你就会一直威吓我。

sentences.en: She does now and then hector a little.
sentences.cn: 她有时会表现出作威作福的样子.

sentences.en: Why don't you go work with Chloe and pin down a location on Hector Salazar?
sentences.cn: 你去跟克洛伊一起追?赫克托的地点不好 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 虚张声势的人；威吓者；恃强凌弱的人

trans.tran_cn: 虚张声势的人,恃强凌弱的人

trans.tran_en: to speak to someone in an angry threatening way
